page.title: 17COMMUNICATIONS IN GUILDFORD
page.content: Guildford's area telephone code is 0483. Calls are directed by the automatic (system X) exchange on Leapale Rd. Local calls (1.2p per min) from Guildford reach Bracknell, Liphook and Sunbury. Around North St. and the High St. there are 11 public phones with a minimum charge of 10p, international calls can also be made. The Post Office is able to forward Telemessages and Telex. The main Post Office is situated in North St. (GU1 1AA) and the automated sorting office is at Woodbridge Meadows. The machines can read typed postcodes automatically thus making a quicker service. All Guildford post codes begin with GU eg. The County School's postcode is GU2 5LU. { By { Jason Tanner, Nicholas Talbot, John { Agombar and Ian Lake
